person.persName: Burdett Clifton Levi (Louisville, Kentucky, barkeeper and steamboat agent)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, barkeeper and steamboat agent. Mason County, Kentucky, native. Son of Willis Levi. Married to Hester A. Curry Levi on April 6, 1841. Married to Mary E. Gibbings Levi in Washington County, Kentucky, on April 3, 1844. Father of Marion C. Levi. Barkeeper in Louisville in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Louisville in 1850. Steamboat agent in partnership with William E. Robinson and Emily A. Moorhead in Moorhead & Company in Louisville from 1858 to 1865. Owned three enslaved persons in Louisville in 1860.
